top_comments.comment: We're getting into double digit worth of games tested, yet the so called 12TFLOPS, an additional 1.7 over the PS5...Still proven to have absolutely no advantage whatsoever..

comments_since_last_sample.body: Play the Performance mode on CRT and your good to go :)
The problem with these powerful consoles is that developers are getting lazy with optimization. 1/4 of the resolution for double the frame rate makes no sense.
Since FSR is supported by these consoles, Why none of these Developers take advantage of that ?
This is a road we are going to find the Series S on more and more as time goes on.
Garbage optimization. Shame.
The generation of consoles arent even 1 year old and have to settle for 1080p60 for graphically intense games. Thats concerning.
I'm playing in 4k 30. I like 60fps but I don't care that much.
So this game can't maintain stable 60fps at 1080p on next gen consoles? Take my money! not.
Disgusting 30fps as usual on console lol
We're getting into double digit worth of games tested, yet the so called 12TFLOPS, an additional 1.7 over the PS5...Still proven to have absolutely no advantage whatsoever..
That low FOV though...

These comments are why no-one takes fanboys with any seriousness. A miniscule minority of gamers with very loud and toxic voices. The game looks amazing. Literally nobody even noticed it was 1080p in performance mode until this analysis video and yet the moment it's mentioned the toxic muppets come out of the woodwork claiming this somehow invalidates the game. First off anyone who actually plays the game wouldn't have noticed the resolution differences which means these toxic comments are almost certainly from people who have neither played nor purchased GotG. Secondly the whole presentation and story are better than the movies and hold true to the comics. Thirdly and also lastly the engine used is pretty old making the achievements of Eidos even more amazing. 
Clearly Square didn't man up on the budget side of things yet we still got this amazing game. In short grow the f*&k up people. If you're not gamers then go place your toxic comments on videos about something you actually do! Pretty sure gaming isn't one of those things!
pathetic.
So if I have a ps5 and a 1080p tv then I can have the best of both worlds, 60fps and a non fuzzy upscaled image. Got it!
Game looking like it's XB360 gen should not run 1080p@30 on Series S.
This is the Reason why i have a PC.
My game doesn’t look like that in performance mode, it looks better
Did Tom say instant notifications? 😂
Xbox SS not havin 60fps is a huge downside. Like, atleast give me 720p 60fps... that really sucks honestly
They said they gonna add RT after launch with a patch so im waiting lol
